nexusNameSearch.dbaNameDescription: Since the business name of your state of origin is unavailable, you will need a DBA name to register your business in New Jersey. Your DBA is the name your business will be referred to in New Jersey.
nexusNameSearch.dbaAvailableText:
**"${name}" is available as your DBA Name!**

You're now ready to authorize your business in New Jersey.
nexusNameSearch.availableText: **"${name}" is available!** This name will be registered with the State ONLY after you submit your business authorization
nexusNameSearch.dbaUnavailableText: Sorry, the name **"${name}"** is already taken in New Jersey. Please search for another DBA name. Here are similar business names that are already taken:
nexusNameSearch.dbaNameHeader: ### Find a Doing Business As (DBA) Name
nexusNameSearch.unavailableText:
